item.title: Polyfitting Colormap
item.description: This one’s a quick writeup on how to encode/decode matplotlib colormap (CC0 license for due diligence) while avoiding using external dependencies.

item.title: shazamio: shazam on your terminal
item.description: I’ve switched to soundcloud for a while now after knowing spotify’s questionable business practices. Living with soundcloud made me realize one thing: most dj sets does not provide track list.

item.title: Jupyter - One-Liner pip Install
item.description: When working with jupyter notebook, you might come across the need to install external packages in your environment with your preferred package manager such as pip.

item.title: Python Hijinks: Parsing OTF
item.description: Few days ago I stumbled upon a documentation for OTF font-file structure on learn.microsoft. For some reason I remembered watching tsoding dialy stream on Parsing Java Bytecode with Python (highly recommended!
